website_summaries.verdict: Good price for a smaller power washer that handles most jobs you have to do around the house.
pros: Gives you 1,600 psi of water pressure and 1.25 gallons per minute of water, which compares favorably to other electric pressure washers in this price range
Able to deliver water up to 20 feet above the ground
Very small, so it's easy to store
cons: Design has a lot of plastic, so longevity is questionable

customer_reviews.title: Nice and compact
customer_reviews.text: This is my second pressure washer within a year and I should have bought this one first. Lots of power for a little machine and the handle collapses for easy transport. Only this I dont like is the front lift handle and main pulling handle are flimsy plastic. But the machine itself is worth the price .
customer_reviews.author: Merica

customer_reviews.title: The hose will not secure to the gun when inserted ...
customer_reviews.text: The hose will not secure to the gun when inserted. The moment the water is turned on and the gun trigger is pulled, the hose falls right out, spraying water all over. I've reviewed photos of the unit online, and having done so, it appears possible (likely?) that the gun is missing a piece that is used to lock the hose into the gun, but none was included. As a result, if I don't purchase a new gun and hose (because I can't locate the part and am not even certain that will fix the gun) the machine is completely unusable and is just taking up space in my garage.
customer_reviews.author: David Michaels

customer_reviews.title: Simply the best
customer_reviews.text: I am replacing my old Karcher (same model) I bought 9 years ago. This thing is indestructible. My old one has been retired to my job @ WWmotox where it is used to wash 3 motocross bikes and 2 ferris mowers weekly. I don't know why I replaced it because my old one still works good after 9 years and probably 2000 hrs of use. How does Karcher do it?
customer_reviews.author: gbcoker91

customer_reviews.title: You get what you pay for ...
customer_reviews.text: Small clip broke the 4th time the pressure washer was used. Design was changed such that clip was no longer used on latest models and is no longer in stock. I am left with an unusable product that is not supported even though it's still under warranty. Nice.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Better than ever!
customer_reviews.text: My first Karcher lasted more years than I can remember, at least 15. I use a pressure washer to clean my large ranch home once every year and to clean my cars several times a month. I also use it to clean my driveway, patio and walkways. To say the least it does get a great workout. This new unit is well constructed and works better than then the older unit using less water. The new unit is also much quieter. I’m very happy with this unit but do wish there was a better storage area for the hose when not in use.
customer_reviews.author: Mr. Nick V

customer_reviews.title: Breaks
customer_reviews.text: Karcher is not what it was. I had a little Karcher (K1000?; carryable; size of two 1 gallon milk containers) for 20 years. It was a champ - the little engine that could. The dirt buster wand made it. It gave its all. I got a K2, it lasted 4 years, although the dirt buster wand died in 2 years (bought a new wand), before pulsating. . I got another K2, it lasted 3 weeks, before pulsating. I returned it. I bought a Ryobi 1600. It is more solid; better design; carryable; and brass fittings instead of cheap plastic. KARCHER - what happened?
customer_reviews.author: Jan M. Greylorn

customer_reviews.title: Worked very well until it broke! It started leaking ...
customer_reviews.text: Worked very well until it broke! It started leaking at a fused seam in one of the plastic components. Karcher sent a brand new (new model) replacement as soon as I submitted the request and it was received a few days later. Can't really complain. I still give it 5 stars.
customer_reviews.author: J. McCullough

customer_reviews.title: Versatile and Easy to Use
customer_reviews.text: I hate working outside. My mother bought one of these to pressure wash her home. I was so impressed with the results that I bought one for my townhome. It worked wonderfully on my decks and privacy walls. Very easy to use and light weight. Worth every penny.
customer_reviews.author: Michael J. Futch

customer_reviews.title: Great for small projects
customer_reviews.text: Compact, light, and relatively quiet. Not super powerful - which on the one hand means kids and others can use it without fear of damaging wood. OTH, it also can't clear off stuff that's super ingrained. Construction is a bit flimsy (it's all plastic), and the handle has already partially broken off - but you get what you pay for right? Don't expect an industrial-strength power washer. That's not what this is. What it is, is very handy for small cleaning projects, and easy to store when not in use.
customer_reviews.author: Thomas Smith

customer_reviews.title: You'll use it for everything-- Not the best build quality but worth every $.
customer_reviews.text: I bought this to wash my car. Absolutely a $ and time saver. I ended up using it to clean my stucco and slate walkway which are way too sensitive for a higher power unit. My rating is based on how much time I've saved oing projects using such an inexpensive and effective unit (car washing, windows, solar panel cleaning, outdoor furniture). Keep in mind the unit is all plastic, just don't drop it or kick it. I'd buy one every year if I had to (at the current price of $70 ish USD) I'd recommend purchasing the Karcher adapter to fit a quality foam cannon to wash your car.
customer_reviews.author: John.ingco

customer_reviews.title: Just died 4 years almost to the day
customer_reviews.text: I bought this item May of 2016. Last night while power washing it gave up and started cycling pressure even when the handle isn't pulled. I have to say up until that point it has worked perfectly. I have used it to clean my pool filters and my concrete pool deck for those years. Considering the price, I guess I got $25 a year's worth of use out of it. I just wish it had lasted longer.
customer_reviews.author: Deputy Gary

customer_reviews.title: Not like my old Karcher
customer_reviews.text: I like to have a low power electric power washer to use for wheels/foam cannon when washing my car and for "quick" jobs around the house when I don't feel like breaking out the 3200 psi gas unit. Really loved my old Karcher, but this one never seemed to have a much power, and after 2 years it's really lost some PSI - struggling to do simple jobs now, looking for a replacement
customer_reviews.author: Lee

customer_reviews.title: so far so good, as I always say
customer_reviews.text: so far so good, as I always say, time will tell all. I just replaced a old Karcher 1300 psi 1.75 GPM that was a reman at that...19 yrs old!! cant complain about that! this one seems to perform nearly equal...def quieter n lighter tho. I wanted easy of use n maneuverability. if you're cleaning heavy equipment....get something w more flow....PSI is not the whole story if you know psi washers. for the money, this is a great general purpose light cleaning rig. the zero blaster wand is the real difference between this and other brands. it takes a really light cleaner and makes it much more effective!
customer_reviews.author: wired

customer_reviews.title: Fine for light use
customer_reviews.text: Product is fine. It is cheap, and as such the parts are ALL plastic, including the hose connectors. This means they are not durable, so don't expect this unit to be suitable for heavy use. Its going to work for light domestic (non-commercial) projects. Otherwise I have cleaned my paving and some outdoor walls and it did a great job.
customer_reviews.author: Ibizarre

customer_reviews.title: but I like that it's light weight and easy to store
customer_reviews.text: Don't know how long this will last, but I like that it's light weight and easy to store. It is very useful for cleaning screens, windows, boats, patios, etc. I diluted some dish detergent and used it to wash the car - that left significant film on the windows. Guess I'll have to try some of the pricey stuff they sell specifically for the unit to see if it works any better. This should be considered specifically for cleaning - it is not strong enough for paint prep or power washing things like driveways and sidewalks unless you are just trying to remove soil, but that I wasn't expecting it to be, so it fits the bill.
customer_reviews.author: EJ

customer_reviews.title: water inlet part has a crack and leaks
customer_reviews.text: The unit works good for washing the car but the water inlet leaks and it was NEVER exposed to cold temperatures. When I took it apart to inspect the leaking area I found the part was cracked and even though the part has it's own part number I Cannot find the exact replacement online.
customer_reviews.author: Dave

customer_reviews.title: It is what I wanted , but I had a couple of problems with it.
customer_reviews.text: Two problems, 1. The carry handle which simply slides and clips into place comes off much too easy. 2. The wand that gives a rotating spray stopped rotating after about 15 minutes. I found that if I unscrewed the spray head and lubricated the rotatory piece with silicon grease and reassemble it again. it would work again for about 15 minutes. I love the results when using the rotary spray head when it works properly/
customer_reviews.author: J. G. B.

customer_reviews.title: My new best friend!
customer_reviews.text: This this is so powerful, it disintegrated the 20+ years of dirt and mold on our concrete slabs. It was so much fun using and watching the concrete turn white as it get clean. I did the backyard, sides of the house on 2 consecutive Saturdays, and this coming Saturday, I will be doing the driveway and front porch! Now I enjoy looking at my backyard and really appreciate how clean it has gotten.
customer_reviews.author: S. Samoranos

customer_reviews.title: EXTREMELY GOOD VALUE
customer_reviews.text: THIS MACHINE IS USED PRIMARILY TO KEEP MY DECK CLEAN AND HAS PERFORMED FAR BEYOND MY EXPECTATION. THE PHYSICAL SIZE IS GREAT FOR EASE OF HANDLING YET HAS PLENTY OF POWER FOR HOMEOWNER USE. I RECOMMEND THIS UNIT FOR BOTH VALUE AND PERFORMANCE.
customer_reviews.author: frazeesr

customer_reviews.title: INCOMPATIBLE WITH OTHER ACCESSORIES
customer_reviews.text: Product uses their own proprietary hose and wand connections with no adapter to fit my various wands and hoses, thus making it unacceptable and unusable for my diverse purposes. They should state this clearly in the ad “NOT COMPATIBLE WITH ANY STANDARD CONNECTIONS TO ANY STANDARD ACCESSORIES – NOT EVEN MANY OTHER KARCHER PRODUCTS!”
customer_reviews.author: VERNON W. JONES

customer_reviews.title: Great while it lasted
customer_reviews.text: Great pressure washer. After a couple of years past end of warrantee the water inlet pipe cracked and leaked profusely from bottom of machine. The broken plastic pipe replacement is $69 + shipping. New machine is $111 pressure washers are short life throw away pressure washers. Other Karcher models replacement part very similar are $7 to $10 dlls.
customer_reviews.author: Jenniffer May

customer_reviews.title: Keep shopping!
customer_reviews.text: Okay...I bought this for my lake house. It was confusing and the hose didn't fit on the outside faucet very well. Once I finally got it on it didn't have any more pressure than my hose with the sprayer. Very disappointed in the purchase but didn't bother to send it back.....too much trouble. I am going to try it at home this spring to see if maybe it was just the hose or the water pressure....but I'm thinking not. There have to be others out there that work better. I should have just borrowed my son's.
customer_reviews.author: KathyC

customer_reviews.title: Cheaply made
customer_reviews.text: Bought 1 year ago, used very lightly maybe 6 times. motor is making a pulsating noise even when knob is in off position. Tried resetting, I tried spraying but it sprays pulsating still. Says 2 year warranty, how do I go about this. If I could I'd upload a video
customer_reviews.author: LGriffin

customer_reviews.title: Very satisfied
customer_reviews.text: Have used quite a bit and works great! I got this when it was on sale and love it! Working on our porch/deck area atm and very happy.
customer_reviews.author: Torie Serkez

customer_reviews.title: Good washer for the price
customer_reviews.text: Bought this to replace a 13 year old Karcher pressure washer. The new one weighs half as much, has higher pressure but has a slightly lower flowrate. Seems to work well but was very disappointed with the operation and quality of the water hose and pressure hose connections. It is very doubtful they will last more than a few years; however, they are replaceable.
customer_reviews.author: Lamar W. Reynolds Jr.

customer_reviews.title: Good, small power washer.
customer_reviews.text: Have an older model, so ordered newer K2 Plus. It arrived quickly, but failed to work. The motor would not turn on. Called Karcher and qualified for a Rapid Replacement. They sent a slightly newer model, the K2 Ergo, which works just like it should. I power washed our patio and it performed as expected. Sorry the first one didn’t, but the company stood behind it for replacement.
customer_reviews.author: Harry L. Doerr MD

customer_reviews.title: Great for my home!
customer_reviews.text: Love it! I purchased it to power wash my two large decks. I am so happy with the results and so easy to use. I never used a power washer before and I couldn't believe how easy it is! I am now power washing my entire property, front entrance, sidewalk, house sided. I was warned that you have to let it "warm up" and that is true but never more than 3 or 4 minutes. I recommend it!
customer_reviews.author: catlover609

customer_reviews.title: Worth every penny
customer_reviews.text: Works great way better than pos pressure washer from harbor freight. This thing perfect minus the fact that their is nowhere to store the pressure washer hose.
customer_reviews.author: Jason Stopher

customer_reviews.title: Poor reconstruction
customer_reviews.text: I hate the new pressure washer setup. I’ve already broke one trying to insert the cord in the quick connection had to purchase another one. Then all of the extension hoses I have for the last model are not of any use to me unless you have the special adapters you have to order from out of the states. Ordered new extension cords but they are hard to come by always out of stock. It would have been nice to have seen the change in the description. Love the brand just a little frustrating
customer_reviews.author: Angelo Johnson

customer_reviews.title: Works perfect for me
customer_reviews.text: Positive: it’s light, easy to put together, quite and yellow lol Negative: leaking when connected to garden hose. I’ve seen it in other reviews before buying it but thought how bad could it be? It’s bad!
customer_reviews.author: zurabi

customer_reviews.title: Does the job!
customer_reviews.text: Got our porch nice and clean again and its fairly cheap compared to others in the market. Plus its small enough it doesnt take up a lot of space
customer_reviews.author: Dax99

customer_reviews.title: holes in the hose
customer_reviews.text: I have purchased 5 of these within the last 2 years for my husband. All 5 of them got holes in the hoses within the first 5 uses. I told my husband never to buy them again but he liked that they are such light weight and my son can use them. But we are done!!! We will NOT buy this product ever again.
customer_reviews.author: Jessie

customer_reviews.title: Terrible, piece of garbage
customer_reviews.text: This leaks everywhere, which is great because you have to plug it in. Since I love life, I ain't messing electricity with leaking water everywhere. I wish there was negative stars for the time wasted.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Incredible Power Washer for the $
customer_reviews.text: This is a perfect power washer for removing mold and dirt from vinyl siding. It just goes to say you don't need to spend several hundred dollars on a power washer. This is a very sweet machine for money
customer_reviews.author: Brian H

customer_reviews.title: Does the job at a good price
customer_reviews.text: Borrowed my neighbor’s and had to get one for myself. More than expected at this price. Did my deck and sidewalks with ease. Takes up almost no storage space and easy to move around compared to my old gas monster.
customer_reviews.author: W. Jones

customer_reviews.title: Buyers beware: The hose has only 90 day warranty
customer_reviews.text: The pressure hose got a leak after 16 months. Called customer care and they said the hose has only 90 days warranty but they were happy to sell a new one for $50 + shipping.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Amazing. I thought I was going to have to ...
customer_reviews.text: Amazing. I thought I was going to have to hand sand my fence after power washing and this washer ripped all the paint completely off of it. I was very surprised and impressed. Now I don't have to repaint, I can just stain it. Very easy to assemble and use. Great product. So worth the price. The two nozzles are great to have, too. One for general washing and one to just annihilate whatever you need stripped or deep cleaned!
customer_reviews.author: Sarah O

customer_reviews.title: Good Luck with this waste of money, please look for something not made by Karcher
customer_reviews.text: It started once....a week later I was able to start it again, for about 2 minutes, pressure was good, turned off and never started again. Customer service and the return policy is set up to look professional and efficient. You will never hear from them again. I am so glad that i got the extended warranty as I have so much money I felt I should just throw it at them. I sent all my documents and never heard from them again.
customer_reviews.author: Thomas Burke

customer_reviews.title: Good quality and good price
customer_reviews.text: I love what a great job it does on my siding and on my driveway. It got the mold of really nicely. The power wand was a bit too much and took the paint off of some wood but I just repainted and it’s fine. Now I know how really powerful it is. I love it and I loved the price.
customer_reviews.author: Barbara J Flowers

customer_reviews.title: Didn't Last
customer_reviews.text: This is the second Karcher washer that experienced a high pressure pump part failure. Making the high pressure parts from molded plastic is disgraceful. The washer lasted just past the warranty, then failed.
customer_reviews.author: emanon

customer_reviews.title: Is this what you want......
customer_reviews.text: Stopped working after 25 minutes of use. Customer service is sending me a new one after going through a pretty long process. Now I won't be able to finish my job for 7 to 10 days. It is very light​ weight and very easy to carry/move around but, as you might suspect, it is not extremely powerful.
customer_reviews.author: Bar Guy

customer_reviews.title: Karcher is the best of all the electric brands on the market
customer_reviews.text: Karcher is the best of all the electric brands on the market. It's reliable, affordable, and easy to use. I have had 2 other Karcher units, much lower pressure units, but the 1600 psi is great for siding, windows, gutters,decking, lawn furniture, etc., where it will not leave marks on any surface.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: but it still worked good. Instead of getting it back from her I ...
customer_reviews.text: This is my second Karcher. The first one I had I gave to my sister, which was only 1500psi and had an internal leak from the first day I bought it. Not really a big deal to me since it's used outside anyway, but it still worked good. Instead of getting it back from her I decided to purchase a new one. This one did not leak and was very easy to setup and use. Not really a lot of power but then that is why I have a gas powered washer when I need heavy duty cleaning. But for light use, like cleaning out trash bins, it does the job.
customer_reviews.author: Jim

customer_reviews.title: Excellent product; GOOD price
customer_reviews.text: This is a good spray washer for around the home use. I had a Karcher spray washer before and it lasted 25 years.
customer_reviews.author: Bill in Orange

customer_reviews.title: this is the best electric power washer we have had
customer_reviews.text: We use this for screen printing. this is the best electric power washer we have had. We have had about 20 in the last ten years. This is quiet, leak free, easy to setup. by far out performs any we got at lowes or home depot.
customer_reviews.author: mrmadjet

customer_reviews.title: Worth the price
customer_reviews.text: This is a great little pressure washer. For the money it does an amazing job. Light weight, easy to set up and use. Whether I am washing the cars or cleaning the driveway, it works great. You can't beat the price for what you get and what it does.
customer_reviews.author: J.S.B.

customer_reviews.title: Well worth the money.
customer_reviews.text: It does what it is supposed to Easy to use Good power for a small washer
customer_reviews.author: m

customer_reviews.title: Great little unit
customer_reviews.text: Solid unit for the price and plenty of power. I bought this power washer with a recommendation from my friend who uses this model for side jobs. I have done the siding on the front of my house, porch, and in the process of doing driveway and it has delivered on all fronts. For the size, price, and power, it's a good price and practical for most home applications. Also, It was shipped free and I received the item 3 days after placing order. Bonus.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Not as good as I thought
customer_reviews.text: Unfortunitely this unit failed on me. Not even a year old and the plastic housing under the pump cracked causing the pump to run, overheat and seize. Disappointed...
customer_reviews.author: Joseph H.

customer_reviews.title: This is the second one.
customer_reviews.text: The first one was great, this one works just as good.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Disappointing
customer_reviews.text: Unfortunately was missing crucial part, so had to send back
customer_reviews.author: Icelily

customer_reviews.title: Do not buy
customer_reviews.text: Wash my cars,this is my second in 18 months first 1 lasted about 1 year and started to leak from the pump and the second 1 i bought ind dec 2018 ,worked for about 3 months and just stopped suddenly no pressure being made. Bought both on amazon and shipped to miami and then to jamaica where i live .
customer_reviews.author: damian

customer_reviews.title: I had one for years and loved it. Eventually the pump housing broke
customer_reviews.text: I had one for years and loved it. Eventually the pump housing broke. I bought another unit in July. Pump housing cracked in March. Karcher will replace the defective part but the not the whole unit. Who in their right mind is going to spend hours disassembling and reassembling $100 pressure washer. Not this guy...my time is more valuable then that. I had a very long discussion with customers service and got no where. Karcher... sorry to say you lost a costumer.
customer_reviews.author: Jason A Jarrett

customer_reviews.title: Great buy for the money!
customer_reviews.text: Works great! At first I couldn't get it to turn on, but found out that the GFCI needed to be reset, after that I was good to go. This is the third Karcher I've had in 20 years and I like this one the best. The quick connects make it super easy to hook up the hoses. Would definitely recommend this one!
customer_reviews.author: Diana Kilgore

customer_reviews.title: great for washing cars
customer_reviews.text: works perfect for cars which is what I only use it for. wish it had a tad bit more pressure so I can get more coverage of the car, but for being the price it's perfect. gave it a 4 because sometime the hose adapter that goes into the machine pops out. but that's probably because I always forget to give it sum slack when trying to move the machine.
customer_reviews.author: ms3

customer_reviews.title: To big to send back.
customer_reviews.text: This was a complete waste of money. It is so huge however I choose not to send it back. I could take a hose and do what this did. So bummed to because I really really needed a pressure washer. DANG!!
customer_reviews.author: Deborah Bloom

customer_reviews.title: Easy to use and effective
customer_reviews.text: Yes it is very light, and very plasticky; but, it has worked very well after about 20 hours of use. I would score the unit highly for ease of use and effectiveness. Maybe not quite so high for durability.
customer_reviews.author: Denise McGhee

customer_reviews.title: As easy to use pressure washer for most outdoor needs.
customer_reviews.text: This is a great pressure washer. Easy to install the couple of items that need to be done by the user. Very good pressure to clear off any surface. I am using this to clean a lot of older paver stones and the washer is handling the job with ease. This is a later version than a previous one that I had and the improvements are great.
customer_reviews.author: Mac4291

customer_reviews.title: Impressive!!
customer_reviews.text: Read some positive reviews on this unit. For the money I figured I'd take a shot. Worth every penny!!! Works as described. Easy set up. Easy to use. I am using it to detail my cars and this unit is ideal for that application.
customer_reviews.author: William

customer_reviews.title: Highly Recommend
customer_reviews.text: Excellent power washer and at such a reasonable price. I have a very large driveway that can easily fit 4 cars and the task was completed within 2 hours. Easy mobility and height of the device was quite nice! Great product- --thank you!
customer_reviews.author: Jolie

customer_reviews.title: A very good versatile pressure washer.
customer_reviews.text: I like the variety of attachments that are available. The suction hose is beneficial for places where a water source isn't readily available. It generates enough pressure for car washing and light to moderate patio cleaning. My only complaint is the how fragile the outer components are. The handle came loose causing me to drop it and the wheel broke. Thankfully the unit is still functional.
customer_reviews.author: Joseph

customer_reviews.title: AWESOME!
customer_reviews.text: Best little power washer! Does a great job pressure washing a our deck at camp.
customer_reviews.author: Karen L.

customer_reviews.title: Does It's job
customer_reviews.text: Works well but I wish it had a little more power. The connection for the hose always leaks water and I cannot get it to stop.
customer_reviews.author: cloudman

customer_reviews.title: glad i went with it
customer_reviews.text: this is a powerful electric pressure washer , happy with purchase only wished it came with foamer instead of that little hose in back where you stick in bucket with solution
customer_reviews.author: joe

customer_reviews.title: Junk
customer_reviews.text: Bought this thing hoping for something that would actually clean my deck, siding, etc. Got it all ready to go, turned it on and it came on for a split second then shut off. Checked, breakers and tested the cord and they worked fine. Tried different outlets and no go. Never got it to see it work. I sent a request into the company for a replacement, but I'm not optimistic.
customer_reviews.author: D. Lehman

customer_reviews.title: Turbo nozzle included! (Dirtblaster)
customer_reviews.text: The fact that this one comes with the turbo nozzle is what makes it such a great deal. These lower pressure units are pretty useless without it. Used 4 times.....so far, so good.
customer_reviews.author: IslandDad

customer_reviews.title: One Star
customer_reviews.text: This was a bad purchase. Broke down after 1 use.
customer_reviews.author: Wickedro

customer_reviews.title: Works great for about 2 years.....
customer_reviews.text: Works great for about 2 years... then breaks down. It’s inexpensive so I’m not shocked that it’s started to breakdown.
customer_reviews.author: AV19

customer_reviews.title: Not as good as advertised
customer_reviews.text: I just bought this machine (1600 psi) and it seems it comes with a defect. There is no pressure . I had to disconnect and use the regular hose.
customer_reviews.author: wello

customer_reviews.title: Got the worst from Quality Control
customer_reviews.text: I bought it on November and I am just using it for the first time, it only lasted 5 minutes, the motor stopped working. Now I am trying to get it fixed or exchanged. Why is that amazon don't just show the customer service phone for claims?
customer_reviews.author: RODRIGO PARTIDA

customer_reviews.title: I think this is a great washer, especially for the price
customer_reviews.text: I think this is a great washer, especially for the price. I especially love the rotary nozzle; it cleans a lot better than the other nozzle they provide. I've used it for a few jobs and it has worked flawlessly.
customer_reviews.author: Accutron

customer_reviews.title: Not as strong as expected. The previous unit I ...
customer_reviews.text: Not as strong as expected. The previous unit I owned was a lower PSI and delivered a lot more. Plus, the handle broke on the second use. Returned it for a mightier unit.
customer_reviews.author: By the Seller

customer_reviews.title: Like a Minion peeing it's pants
customer_reviews.text: Don't bother. As other reviews have said, it's junk. Worked for first summer, stored in winter in heated garage. Leaks all over and no pressure this year.
customer_reviews.author: Mike

customer_reviews.title: Compact and effective.
customer_reviews.text: This is a neatly little tool, it's great for small jobs like washing off the deck, or detailing the car. It's not industrial so if you need something to wash down an earth moving machine this is not for you.
customer_reviews.author: David Roberts

customer_reviews.title: Very dependable machine
customer_reviews.text: This is a small but mighty machine. I bought the attachment so I could use our lake water to power wash our deck. It worked great. You have to hold the wand close though. The larger one may have had more power. This did the job though
customer_reviews.author: karen kraft

customer_reviews.title: Not worth the money
customer_reviews.text: Second time I used it fell apart. Very light weight unit. Bought heave duty gas unit.
customer_reviews.author: G. Sonsel

customer_reviews.title: Nice little unit
customer_reviews.text: For smaller jobs. Lightly built. Treat it with care. Not for heavy jobs or heavy usage.
customer_reviews.author: DrChrispie

customer_reviews.title: had a problem
customer_reviews.text: This sprayer had a good priced and mechanically worked well but the body was poorly constructed, as the upper handle broke off in about a month. I sent it back to Amazon and received a refund .
customer_reviews.author: JEB

customer_reviews.title: Great for the price
customer_reviews.text: I have had this for 3 months and have only used it about 4 times but I like it. It is light, has good power
customer_reviews.author: jojo

customer_reviews.title: get a better product
customer_reviews.text: assembled turned it on and never worked unfortunately i never got to attempt to use it ill it was out of the return time frame. 20 Nov 2010
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Best pressure washer ever used!
customer_reviews.text: I had an older model that my daughters dog chewed the cords into on. I cried!! This newer model has easy connectors and better assembly/disassembly capabilities. Having two wands is fantastic! One for general purposes and another for things that need a little extra punch (be sure the surface is hard!) Absolutely satisfied!
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Very bad Leak at Garden Hose Connection
customer_reviews.text: Does not feel well constructed and water leaks/sprays at garden hose connections. Cannot use in garage as the spray from the leaks gets all over drywall. Hard to keep unit dry with leak. 2 star given leaking issue coupled with being an electrical unit.
customer_reviews.author: Devin C

customer_reviews.title: This thing is great! Very easy to operate and cleans just about ...
customer_reviews.text: This thing is great! Very easy to operate and cleans just about anything. Power washed the house and the steps - great job!
customer_reviews.author: Heidi

customer_reviews.title: Love this pressure washer it does the job I would ...
customer_reviews.text: Love this pressure washer it does the job I would buy another one. I recommend it for sure Amazon did a great job! D.J.
customer_reviews.author: Daniel J. Haentzler

customer_reviews.title: Buy This Washer, You Won't Regret It!
customer_reviews.text: Wow! I had a gas powered washer and it always had problems, this washer is very powerful and did an excellent job!
customer_reviews.author: Greg

customer_reviews.title: Works well for the homeowner
customer_reviews.text: Very portable. Not as powerful as I had hoped but worked well in removing old paint from cedar fence boards.
customer_reviews.author: Craig

customer_reviews.title: "Quiet" compared to my previous electric pressure washer.
customer_reviews.text: Works great and not terribly loud. The quick connectors make this a breeze to set up and tear down.
customer_reviews.author: A.Y.

customer_reviews.title: Great power washer for around the house.
customer_reviews.text: Very good low usage power washer. Does the job that I intended it to do and did it well. Not sure how it would stand up if used everyday for big jobs. I liked the Karcher K2.....
customer_reviews.author: Bigal

customer_reviews.title: Works Well
customer_reviews.text: We have only used it once since purchasing, but it did fine. Will write more later.
customer_reviews.author: egtc

customer_reviews.title: Karcher Power Washer.
customer_reviews.text: When my Karcher power washer came back from a loan out broken, within 15 minutes I had another one on its way. Wouldn't be without one.
customer_reviews.author: R. C.

customer_reviews.text: Amazing item. It is my second time that i purchase this power wash. Highly recommended
customer_reviews.author: Elie

customer_reviews.title: Good for small projects.
customer_reviews.text: Good small project pressure washer. Great for times you don’t want / need the big gas powered pressure washer.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Works great
customer_reviews.text: Works great for washing the car, sidewalk, deck, etc. Provided electric cord is long and includes GFI. Only thing I wish it came with was a reservoir for detergent. It has a little hose that you submerge in your own bottle which works fine if you don't need to move the pressure washer around frequently. Apart from that, it's great.
customer_reviews.author: Armitage

customer_reviews.title: ... this it to clean a boat and it's really good for it
customer_reviews.text: I buy this it to clean a boat and it's really good for it...small easy to use and enough power
customer_reviews.author: IDanch

customer_reviews.title: Turbo nozzle broke after one use...
customer_reviews.text: Not as powerful as I imagined it would be, although it worked fine cleaning my concrete driveway the ONE time I was able to use it. Unfortunately, the Turbo nozzle was inoperable today as I attempted to use it for only the second time. I disassembled and cleaned it with no luck. Now I have to spend another $15 for a replacement nozzle.
customer_reviews.author: jriv

customer_reviews.title: Very powerfull. Used the cleaning wand that shoots water ...
customer_reviews.text: Very powerfull. Used the cleaning wand that shoots water in little circles. Cleaned my brick patio and concrete driveway very well. Would recomend this product.
customer_reviews.author: Patrick

customer_reviews.title: It does the JOB
customer_reviews.text: I used it cleaning my deck and it saved me a lot of work and time
customer_reviews.author: Ralph

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: Works great and the price was right. Cleans very well and easy to maneuver.
customer_reviews.author: Art Dake Jr

customer_reviews.title: this little unit does a great job around the house/garage
customer_reviews.text: this little unit does a great job around the house/garage..took a chance on the low cost but so far after a few months, still functions as expected.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: It's a $90 garden hose
customer_reviews.text: This pressure washer is terrible. I did appreciate the easy click in assembly. However this product offers no power. The pressure is so weak. I wasn't expecting much from this washer considering it's a very cheap pressure washer, but honestly it is very comparable to a garden hose.
customer_reviews.author: Patricia

product_meta.title: Karcher K2 Ergo Electric Power Pressure Washer, 1600 PSI, 1.25 GPM
product_meta.description:
Style:K2 ErgoKarcher’s 1600 PSI K2 Ergo pressure washer delivers strong cleaning power for jobs around the house. The adjustable, telescoping handle makes transport easy - reducing bending and strain. The Vario spray wand allows for quick adjustment between low and high pressure without the need to switch nozzles. For the most stubborn stains, use the patented Dirtblaster spray wand.

Specifications:::Model: K2 Ergo, Part Number: 1.602-316.0, Performance Ratings: 1600 PSI 1.25 GPM, Pump: Karcher N-Cor, Water Inlet: N-Cor Quick Connect, Water Outlet: N-Cor Quick Connect, Trigger Gun: Easy Connect, High Pressure hose: 20ft. Thermoplastic, Included Spray Wands: Vario Power Spray Wand / Dirtblaster Spray Wand, Features: Trigger Gun Holder /Spray Wand Holder / Retractable Handle, Wheel Size: 160mm, Electric Cord: 35ft. with GFCI, Warranty: Two Year Limited Karcher Warranty, Product Weight: 16.8 pounds, Product Dimensions: 11.02 inches x 9.53 inches x24.53 inches.
feature_bullets: Telescopic handle design – reduces bending and strain
Vario Power Spray wand – easily adjust spray right from the wand
Dirtblaster spray wand – tackles the hardest jobs in half the time
N-COR pump – durable, non-corrosive and maintenance-free

specifications.Customer Reviews: 4.1 out of 5 stars631 ratings4.1 out of 5 stars
